medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) with multiple episodes of nausea and vomiting, anorexia, fevers, and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started around 1 am, localized to the RLQ. Symptoms have progressed with multiple episodes of non-bilious non-bloody emesis, anorexia, fevers, and chills. No dysuria or testicular pain reported.
